# Import Code

```

```

# Installation

There are four actions included. You will want to define a Command and point it to the "Play" action. There is a "Gunshot" action that you will want to update to the sound file you want to use (I got mine from myinstants.com). I have an emote code in the "Survived" action message you'll want to update as well. Feedback is welcome.
